code: import{legacy_createStore as createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import{composeWithDevTools}from'@redux-devtools/extension';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import rootReducer from'./reducers';var store=createStore(rootReducer,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware(thunk)));if(window.Cypress){window.store=store;}export default store;
